<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Drow Rogue](/Monsters.aspx?ID=166)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Loners at heart, drow rogues trust no one—least of all fellow slayers. These drow rely on awareness and adaptation to survive the cutthroat nature of their society.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Drow Rogue](/Monsters.aspx?ID=166)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Drow" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=51" />
<trait label="Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=58" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 137</row>

**Perception** +6; darkvision

**Languages**
[Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +7, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +4, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +10, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +1
</row>

**[Light Blindness](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=22)**

**Items**
[Lethargy Poison](/Equipment.aspx?ID=120) (2 doses), [Studded Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5), [Hand Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=69) (10 bolts)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +6 

+1 status to all saves vs. magic, +2 status to all saves vs. mental
</row>

**HP** 26

**Immunities**
sleep

**Nimble Dodge** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Requirement** A drow rogue can’t use this reaction while encumbered. **Trigger** The drow rogue is hit or critically hit by an attack made by a creature the drow rogue can see. **Effect** The drow rogue gains a +2 circumstance bonus to their Armor Class against the triggering attack.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortsword +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hand crossbow +10 ([range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6 piercing plus [_lethargy poison_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=120)

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 16
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Dancing Lights](/Spells.aspx?ID=58)
- **2nd**
[Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59) (at will), [Faerie Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=107) (at will)

**Quick Draw** <actions string="Single Action" />  The drow rogue draws a weapon using the Interact action, then Strikes with that weapon.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The drow rogue deals 1d6 extra precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

</column>
